plugin_editor.description: An Editor which let's you view and edit plugins inside the game!

party_filter.description: Adds Filters in the gather->public window.

sandbox.description: Spawn, control and bots, change music, add teams, spawn objects, change game values in real time, and much more!

updown.description: Adds UP and DOWN buttons in party window to recall messages in chat.

rejoin.description: Adds a button in pause menu, which rejoins current server once clicked! if didn't work, just click again and again. if still, then party is full.

topmsg.description: When chat is muted, see new chat messages on top right! (like kill logs)

sorry.description: Send a random sorry to chat, preventing revenge attempts from teammates you kill by mistake.

translate.description: Translate yours/others chat. Just click on the message to translate them. Open Plugin Settings/Double click 'Trans' button to open translation settings. Compatible with other PW mods (like advanced_party_window)

random_join.description: Come visit the unknown servers around all the world! Plugin designed not to join servers with similar names more frequently than rare ones. Have fun!

manual_camera.description: Adjust the games camera angle/position. Open pause menu and press 'Manual Camera' button. Useable in OFFLINE/ONLINE/REPLAYS

share_replay.description: Export replays to mods folder and share them with friends or have a backup

custom_death.description: Characters turn to Bones after death

max_players.description: Increase the max player limit of 8 players

quick_custom_game.description: Quckly create a custom game with any gamemode

colored_bomb_explosion_patches.description: Creates patches of random color after bomb explosions

chat_cmd.description: chatcmd for a beutiful game  - BombSquad OwO,type /help in chat for more info

mood_light.description: Dynamic lighting in co-op games (adjustable using "ml" chat command)

store_event_specials.description: Exposes event-special store items not normally available for purchase

unlock_TowerD.description: Ability to play Tower-D map in ffa/team games!

floater.description: Calls a overpowered floater in any gamemode. Chat /floater to activate!

easy_connect.description: Can connect easily to servers by retrying automatically till you join the server.

advanced_party_window.description: Advanced your party window with lots of feature

auto_stunt.description: auto stunts, learn stunts, mirror your player, bro elimination mini game

file_share.description: share/import mods, replays, custom characters/maps with link or QR code

server_switch.description: Let you switch between recents servers

character_chooser.description: Let you choose your character before joining game.

character_maker.description: Make new characters by manipulating models and textures.

icons_keyboard.description: Enable 'Always Use Internal Keyboard' in Settings>Advanced. Double tap space-bar to change keyboards

pro_unlocker.description: Unlocks some pro-only features - custom colors, playlist maker, etc. (Please support the game developer if you can!)

ultra_party_window.description: Ultra your party window with lots of features

quickturn.description: Sharp turns while running (releasing run button, changing direction, holding run again) are much faster with this mod, allowing for more dynamic, aggressive play.

ragdoll_b_gone.description: Removes ragdolls. Thanos snaps those pesky feet-tripping body sacks out of existence.

bomb_radius_visualizer.description: With this cutting edge technology, you precisely know how close to the bomb you can tread. Supports modified blast radius values!

disco_light.description: Add disco light into the game. Do '/disco' to turn on and '/disco off' to turn off

practice_tools.description: Powerful and comprehensive tools for practice purposes. Practice tabs can be accessed through party window.

health_indicator.description: Add a simple health indicator on every player and bot.

autorun.description: Run without holding any buttons. Made for beginners or players on mobile. Keeps your character maneuverable. Start running as usual to override.

tnt_respawn_text.description: Shows when a TNT box is about to respawn with non-intrusive text.

allow_invisible_models.description: Changing model to None will make it invisible instead of raising an exception.

random_play.description: Play randomly generated FFA or Teams matches from your installed minigames and maps.

menu_theme.description: A simple UI mod for customizing the Main Menu's appearance. Go to your profiles for use

cheat_menu.description: Cheat menu on the settings window

natpmp_upnp.description: Automatic port forwarding if upnp is enabled

wave_emote.description: Type `hello` in chat while in game and get a wave emote

fast_epic_toggle.description: Switch between Epic/Fast mode easier in-game!
